intro: Crossandra leikipiensis, commonly known as the Kauai crossandra, is a flowering plant native to the Hawaiian island of Kauai. It belongs to the Acanthaceae family and is characterized by its vibrant orange to red tubular flowers. The plant typically grows in shaded, moist environments such as rainforests and streamside habitats. Its leaves are opposite, lance-shaped, and often covered in fine hairs. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, Crossandra leikipiensis is considered a rare and endangered species.
